content: भोग्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भुज् ण्यत् कुत्वं] {@--1@} To be enjoyed or turned to one's account; <ls>R. 8. 14</ls>, <ls>Pt. 1. 117.</ls> {@--2@} To be suffered or endured; <ls>Me. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Profitable. --ग्यं {@--1@} Any object of enjoyment. {@--2@} Wealth, property, possessions. {@--3@} Corn, grain. --ग्या A harlot, courtezan.
